type: IACS6 GenII Survival Vest and accessories
full_summary:
## IACS6 Gen II Survival Vest and Accessories Tender Announcement

### Notice of Proposed Procurement

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the supply of personal safety and protection items. The items listed below must be delivered to the Canadian Forces Supply Depot (CFSD) in Montreal by September 30th, 2023.

#### Required Items

| Item | Description | Quantity | Unit of Issue |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Ammunition Magazine | 100 | EA |
| 2 | Individual Equipment Carrier Bag | 50 | EA |
| 3 | Grenade Carrier | 50 | EA |
| 4 | Deltoid Protector | 50 | SE |
| 5 | IACS6 Gen II Survival Vest | 50 | EA |
| 6 | Medical Packet, Individual, Survival Kit | 50 | EA |

#### Important Notice

Due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, bidders are strongly encouraged to submit their proposals electronically using the epost Connect service instead of traditional methods.

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Contract Requirements

Only suppliers who provide equivalent or substitute products will be considered. Proposed products must include a brand name and model, or part number, as well as the National Stock Number (NSN) and the Canadian Enterprise Number (CEN).

### Tender Details

* Solicitation Number: W8485-237615/A
* Publication Date: April 5, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: May 9, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: May 9, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: August 31, 2023
* Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
* Regions of Delivery: Canada
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding

### Contact Information

For more information or to submit a bid, please contact:

Dany Lebel
Email: [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (000) 000-0000
Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

Attachments: [PDF documents in English and French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice
